page.title: 16RELIGION 2
page.content: BARNTON AND LITTLE LEIGH 03600375 Baptism as adult by complete immersion L.L.tiled pool beneath.Mass and belief in power of Virgin Mary unique to Catholic faith.Ch:Our Lady of Fatima, Hayes Drive 759/643.Father lives presbytery,Lydyett Lane opp.mod.Church 3 groups Non-conformists unite in 601/636 Runcorn Rd.Sun.Sch.&Lydyett Lane Methodist Chapel,very active. Serves 5,2nd yr.Pentecostal High Bank Chapel newest of all.Meadow Dr.764/634 in prefabricated mobile bought from County.Last 3 do not have graveyard, public cemetery Hayes Dr.641/754.Used by established ch.Church of England has only few family graves still empty in Christchurch burial area,Church Rd 637/75.Large tower,1 bell.Very active. All faiths - Youth Clubs Friday even- ing,11-20yrs.All chs.gained new members after 3 yr. Mission to England
